revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ubee |model=DVW324 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/13/2012 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U10C074 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=cable modem,wireless router,analog phone gateway |fcc_id=XCNDVW324,QDS-BRCM1054 |ic_id=4324A-BRCM1054 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3383 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (half),USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Foxconn U40Z028 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43228 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} The description in the FCC test report for this device is '''Broadcom 3383Z Wireless eMTA'''. It is assumed to use BCM3383 (BCM3383Z??).
"U10C074" and "REV.0 GP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The wireless module is a '''Foxconn''' U40Z028 ('''Broadcom''' BCM943228HM4LD ref. design). The FCC photos show it with a DW1530 label (A4:17:31 OUI on the label in the FCC photos).
